org.bukkit.configuration.serialization
Interface ConfigurationSerializable

All Known Subinterfaces:
BookMeta, EnchantmentStorageMeta, FireworkEffectMeta, FireworkMeta, ItemMeta, LeatherArmorMeta, MapMeta, OfflinePlayer, Player, PotionMeta, SkullMeta
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockVector, Color, FireworkEffect, ItemStack, PoreBookMeta, PoreEnchantmentStorageMeta, PoreFireworkMeta, PoreItemMeta, PoreLeatherArmorMeta, PoreMapMeta, PoreOfflinePlayer, PorePlayer, PorePotionMeta, PoreSkullMeta, PotionEffect, Vector
public interface ConfigurationSerializable

Represents an object that may be serialized.

These objects MUST implement one of the following, in addition to the methods as defined by this interface:

  • A static method "deserialize" that accepts a single Map< String, Object> and returns the class.
  • A static method "valueOf" that accepts a single Map<String, Object> and returns the class.
  • A constructor that accepts a single Map<String, Object>.
In addition to implementing this interface, you must register the class with ConfigurationSerialization.registerClass(Class).

See Also:
DelegateDeserialization, SerializableAs

Method Summary
 Map<String,Object> serialize()
          Creates a Map representation of this class.
 

Method Detail

serialize

Map<String,Object> serialize()
Creates a Map representation of this class.

This class must provide a method to restore this class, as defined in the ConfigurationSerializable interface javadocs.

Returns:
Map containing the current state of this class
